column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////While I did enjoy the pizza
column2: I've actually had better in the Tampa Bay area
column3: at Paul's Chicago Pizza. The crust at Lou Malnati's was a bit different than what I expected - it was actually a little bit hardened. I didn't think it was a bad thing
column4: but just not what I imagined it would be. But the primary reason I prefer Paul's in Clearwater is because it's just absolutely swamped with cheese
column5: where Lou Malnati's had plenty of cheese
column6: but it just wasn't quite the level of Paul's.
